body.name: PayLessHere Memory Foam Mattress Cooling Gel Bamboo Charcoal Infused Mattress 8 inch Mattress CertiPUR-US Certified Breathable Bed Mattress Pressure Relief,Fiberglass Free,White Full
features: 【Soothing and decompression】: the pressure relieving gel foam in our mattress can naturally take away heat from the body, making you sleep more comfortable at night; The detailed four-way stretching omnidirectional cover is used together with memory foam to optimize its consistency. The gel memory foam keeps cool during sleep. The memory foam that shapes the body contour can reduce pressure points and align the spine correctly.

【Medium firm mattress】: a healthy spine needs a suitable gel mattress. Each mattress has been certified by CertiPUR US and does not contain any harmful substances, so that you and your children can sleep safely. The mattress adopts air flow gel memory foam, which can adapt to the micro pressure points of the body and bring higher comfort.

【CertiPUR Certification】: Our bamboo charcoal memory cotton mattresses are certified by CertiPUR in the United States, have undergone independent safety assessments, comply with all applicable mandatory and voluntary safety standards for mattress products, and are free of any harmful substances, allowing you and your child to sleep peacefully.

【Zipper Design】: Our memory cotton mattress features a zipper design in the middle, making it easy to regularly remove the fabric cover for cleaning and easy to operate. The fabric cover is soft and comfortable, making it easy to clean.

【No glass fiber protective cover】: there is a soft protective sleeve outside the mattress, which provides a safe and effective flame retardant layer around the memory foam, and will not stimulate the skin, cause respiratory problems and health risks to you and your family. CertiPUR US certification.
body.description: --☎☎-Care Instructions Upon Receipt : It is also a good idea to know the size and the height of your mattress ahead of time to make sure you are ordering the correct size. Keep in mind that you should combine the height of your bed frame, foundation, or adjustable bed base with the height of your mattress to get a gauge of the how tall your sleep system will be. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Mattress has completely transformed my sleeping experience
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the PayLessHere Memory Foam Mattress with Cooling Gel and Bamboo Charcoal Infusion, and it has completely transformed my sleeping experience.The 8-inch thickness strikes a perfect balance, providing ample support without sacrificing comfort. The memory foam contours to my body, offering a personalized sleep surface that alleviates pressure points.The cooling gel feature is a game-changer. It effectively regulates temperature throughout the night, ensuring a cool and comfortable sleep. I no longer wake up feeling overheated, and the bamboo charcoal infusion adds a subtle touch of freshness.The construction of the mattress feels solid, and the materials used inspire confidence in its durability. The combination of memory foam, cooling gel, and bamboo charcoal creates a sleep environment that promotes relaxation and restfulness.What stands out about this mattress is its ability to isolate motion, making it an excellent choice for couples. The technology used minimizes disturbances, allowing for uninterrupted sleep.The price point of the PayLessHere mattress is competitive, considering the quality and features it offers. If you're in search of a budget-friendly memory foam mattress with cooling properties, this is a fantastic option.In conclusion, the PayLessHere Memory Foam Mattress delivers on its promises of comfort, support, and temperature regulation. It's a wise investment for anyone seeking a restful night's sleep without breaking the bank.Please note that for a more accurate and helpful review, it's essential to include specific details about your experience with the mattress, such as how long you've been using it, any noticeable effects on sleep quality, and any unique features that stood out to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got 2 of these and they're perfect! Super comfortable and easy to set up. Definitely a great bed for kids as well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about buying this ultimately I gave it a try because of the GREAT price, I ordered the 12’ inchAnd to my surprise it is true to size, quality feels GREAT, but must importantly the comfort is also GREAT , after sleeping on it for the first night, I had a GREAT restful night. ! I’m considering upgrading all rooms with this mattress. I truly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality mattress for a good price
reviews.reviewText: I got a full size mattress for my spare bedroom. The mattress came in super quick it was suppose to come the 25th. I ordered the mattress on the 16th. So super fast delivery. The mattress puffed up with in 30 mins to the 12” profile. It’s super comfortable, not too firm and not too soft. This will definitely be perfect for guest when they come visit. Even my dog like the bed. He won’t stay off it. The only thing that I wasn’t a fan of was the mattress did have a slight smell. But by opening a window the smell is mostly gone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and Oh So Comfy!
reviews.reviewText: This is the most comfortable mattress I've ever slept on! First, it came 5 days early(yay!), 2nd, no awful odor, 3rd, it expanded much quicker than expected, 4th, it is so comfortable, and last but not least, extremely affordable, especially since I'm disabled, on a limited fixed income. Simple things like replacing is so expensive these days, and I have been searching for months for the right one at the right price. I have a second bed that needs the mattress replaced, I will be buying another in the next month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because I just moved and was sleeping on an air mattress and decided I needed to get an actual bed. It came in faster than expected, it’s huge truly a king size and it both soft to lay on yet a little firm. Great buy!! I don’t think you’ll be disappointed, was definitely worth my money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I recommend this mattress. Worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I ordered the king size-12 inch mattress on 11/13 & received it on 11/17, delivered to Memphis. I’ve recently just moved into my new apartment & finally opened the box & slept on it. I’m currently 5 months pregnant with twins so it is very comfy on my back & my belly. So much relief. It’s not too firm nor too soft & it’s true to size. No smell when opened. Right now it’s on the floor until I can afford to get a platform bed frame & yet still very comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love my new mattress. So comfortable and has held up well. Not real soft but not hard. I sleep so good.
